dcterms:description: A large-scale watchlist dataset sampled from the eBay e-commerce platform, containing user interactions with items in their watchlist over a two-week period. The dataset includes multiple attributes for each item, such as item-ID, user-ID, price, seller-ID, condition, and categories.
dcterms:title: eBay Watchlist Dataset
